commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Bot reads and echos back command
commitResults.messageBody:
- Bot's name is now "Arii"
- Bot's behaviour is updated to greet, echo and exit

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Bot stores user texts and displays back when requested
commitResults.messageBody: - Stores user texts and displays them with the 'list' command

commitResults.messageTitle: fix: Fix list starts from 1 instead
commitResults.messageBody: - Adjusted list displayed starts from index 1 instead of 0

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add mark and unmark commands
commitResults.messageBody:
- Mark and unmark commands have been added to change the status of a
  task

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add new task types
commitResults.messageBody:
- DeadlineTask, EventTask and TodoTask added
- deadline, event, todo commands have been added correspondingly
